about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey in "The Quest of The Tiny Hero," a captivating 2D top-down RPG that invites players into a world teeming with vibrant life and boundless adventure. Designed to charm with its pixel-art visuals and enchant players with its RPG mechanics, this title is a love letter to the classic role-playing games that have enchanted us for decades.

Key Features
Quest System: Immerse yourself in quests granted by other villagers and travellers you meet on your adventure. From defeating formidable foes to finding mystical artefacts, each quest is a brushstroke in the grand painting of your hero's saga.

Craft Your Destiny: Harness the resources of the land to forge new gear, mix potions, and prepare for the trials ahead. Crafting is key to your growth as the village champion.

A World Alive with Possibility: Explore diverse zones, from lush grasslands to dry. Discover dungeons, settlements, and secrets that dot the landscape, all waiting for the touch of an explorer.

Progressive Challenge: As you become stronger, so do your adversaries. New challenges will emerge, requiring courage and strength, leading to the ultimate confrontation with a powerful enemy.

Charming Aesthetics and Sound: Enjoy the nostalgic allure of pixel art coupled with a soundtrack that evokes the spectrum of emotions in your journey—from the serenity of your village to the adrenaline of combat.

For Whom is This Quest?

"The Quest of The Tiny Hero" is an accessible entry into the RPG genre that offers a fulfilling adventure for both newcomers and seasoned players.
Can you rise from the diminutive stature of an aspiring hero to become the titan your village needs? Your quest awaits.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ or similar
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+ or similar
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760, AMD Radeon R9 270X, or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
